data.meta_description: WHOSE IDEA WAS THIS: The greatest thing in life is having a soulmate who supports you, trusts you, and is super supportive on the health side (and I am…
data.text:
Your faith and your health are a match made in heaven! 🙌 When you combine prayer and personalized care, you're on a path to whole-body wellness that feels just right. At Sozo Functional Medicine, we believe in addressing the root causes of your health issues, not just the symptoms. 🌱 Ready to embrace a life where your spiritual and physical health are in harmony? Explore how integrating faith into your health journey can uplift your well-being. 💪 Share your thoughts or experiences with faith and health below, or reach out to us to learn more about our holistic approach! 💌 #HolisticHealth #FaithAndWellness #SozoFunctionalMedicine #SozoFunctionalMedicine

I love what I do! I'm so grateful, I get to do what I love! T.S embraced a new mindset and was interested to learn more about the key factors that impact her overall health. She is well on her way to optimal health! I'm honored you allowed me to join your journey! WooHoo! What's going on with our bodies should not be a mystery. We must become highly interested in what our temple needs to function optimally. Knowledge is power! Implementing knowledge makes us POWERFUL! If you KNEW better, could you, should you, would you do better? #KnewtritionalKnowledge #LetsTransformTogether #KommunityIsKey

😒 Heartburn isn’t just a minor annoyance—it’s a potential health hazard. Left untreated, it can escalate into serious problems. But fear not; there’s a smarter path forward—one that doesn’t rely solely on pills or antacids. 🌱 “Engineering Healing of Heartburn” unveils this path. Dr. Judy Gao, a physician who faced heartburn head-on, shares her transformative journey. Here’s what you’ll discover: 💊 Beyond Quick Fixes: Dr. Gao’s approach transcends temporary relief. She marries medical knowledge with herbal wisdom for lasting results. 🥛 The Long-Term Solution: No more short-term fixes. Learn how to heal heartburn sustainably using supplements, herbs, and traditional medicine. 👩⚕A Doctor’s Insight: Dr. Gao’s personal experience fuels her expertise. She walks the talk, and her wisdom is your guide. Empowering Choices: Armed with knowledge, you’ll make informed decisions for your well-being. 💕 Why pick up this book? Because it’s time to rewrite your heartburn story. Dr. Gao’s personal and professional guide will change your life—one intelligent step at a time. #heartburn #GERD #healthylifestyle #HeartburnCare, #AcidReflux, #HealthyEating, #LifestyleChanges, #Medication, #NaturalRemedies, #GERD, #selfcare

The gut is the foundation of your health - truly! In fact, Dr. Alessio Fassano has stated that “leaky” gut is a precondition for developing autoimmunity. So how can you make sure your gut is healthy? I went over 3 everyday habits (and what to do instead!) that are destroying our guts yesterday in my group, Health Creators: https://lnkd.in/gWhBWdM3 I also explain what we’re really talking about when we say “gut health,” so you know exactly what your goal is! Too many times I see people trying to take action, but lacking a good plan that will actually make a difference! A great start to improving your health - and let’s face it, your LIFE - is joining. It’s FREE and you’ll have access to all the previous archived mini-classes, handouts, and perks!

Today, will you reflect on the ways grace has shown up in your life? We’d love for you to share your stories, your insights, and your struggles. Let's create a space of grace-filled conversation and mutual understanding. Together, we can embrace the beauty of grace and let it illuminate our paths. 💫✨ #Becauseyoumatter #Myndmyself To learn more about reliable holistic and complementary health information, click links in bio @myndmyself #EmbraceGrace #GracefulConversations #Loveyourself #Imperfection
